block.p: SCHUSTERMAN - Shira. The Board and Staff of the American Friends of the Israel Museum are deeply saddened by the tragic death of Shira Schusterman, granddaughter of our National Committee Member and generous supporter, Lynn Schusterman. We offer our heartfelt condolences to Lynn, Charles and the entire family. James S. Snyder, Anne & Jerome Fisher Dir., IM Judy Steinhardt, Co-Chair, AFIM Carolyn Cohen, Exec Dir, AFIM

SCHUSTERMAN-Shira. Alongside our dear friends, Lynn and Charles Schusterman, all of birthright israel mourns the tragic loss of their granddaughter, Shira, daughter of Ruth and Hal Schusterman. May they and the entire Schusterman family be comforted among the mourners of Zion. And may Shira's memory be forever a blessing. The Partners of birthright israel Dr. Shimshon Shoshani, International CEO
